title: Stand for Freedom in Cuba | Guests: Jason Whitlock & Art Laffer | 7/12/21
description:
Glenn returns from his vacation to a whole new list of things that are now racist. Democrats are looking to federally control our credit scores. Vice President Kamala Harris thinks rural Americans can’t access photocopiers to send in voter IDs. Glenn explains why America must support a free Cuba and stop the spread of socialism in our nation. Jason Whitlock, host of BlazeTV’s "Fearless with Jason Whitlock," joins to talk photocopiers, the fall of academia, and who’s worse: President Biden or VP Harris? The World Economic Forum’s founder wants to vaccinate the internet, and Glenn explains what this means for everyone. Former Reagan economic adviser Arthur Laffer joins with an update on America’s debt and advice for our relationships with China and Cuba.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
